name: Bench Press
instructions: Lie flat on a bench and press the barbell upward.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Lie on an incline bench and press dumbbells upward.

name: Push-ups
instructions: Start in plank position and lower your chest to the ground.

name: Pull-ups
instructions: Grip the bar with palms facing away and pull your body up.

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Pull the bar down towards your chest while seated.

name: Deadlift
instructions: Lift the barbell from the floor to a standing position.

name: Barbell Row
instructions: Bend forward and row the barbell towards your waist.

name: Bicep Curl
instructions: Curl the dumbbells upward while keeping your elbows still.

name: Tricep Dips
instructions: Lower your body on parallel bars to target your triceps.

name: Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: Extend a dumbbell overhead with both hands.

name: Squats
instructions: Lower your body down into a squat position with a barbell.

name: Lunges
instructions: Step forward into a lunge position while holding dumbbells.

name: Leg Press
instructions: Press the platform upward with your legs.

name: Leg Curls
instructions: Curl your legs towards your body while seated.

name: Leg Extensions
instructions: Extend your legs upward while seated.

name: Calf Raises
instructions: Raise your heels off the ground to target your calves.

name: Plank
instructions: Hold your body straight in a plank position.

name: Russian Twists
instructions: Twist your torso while seated with knees bent.

name: Crunches
instructions: Perform a crunch by raising your torso towards your knees.

name: Mountain Climbers
instructions: Alternate bringing your knees toward your chest in a plank.
